bibl.title: Security and Water on the Eastern Desert Roads: The Prefect Iulius Ursus and the Construction of praesidia under Vespasian
bibl.note: 1. The foundation inscription at Sikayt, A.D. 76/7 (R.S.B.). - 2. The foundation inscriptions at Aphrodites [= I. Pan 68] and Didymoi (A.B.-J. and H.C.). - 3. From the hydreumata to the praesidia (A.B.-J. and H.C.). - 4. L. Iulius Ursus, prefect of Egypt (R.S.B.).
bibl.seg: BAGNALL Roger S., Adam BÜLOW-JACOBSEN and Hélène CUVIGNY, Security and Water on the Eastern Desert Roads: The Prefect Iulius Ursus and the Construction of praesidia under Vespasian.

1. The foundation inscription at Sikayt, A.D. 76/7 (R.S.B.). - 2. The foundation inscriptions at Aphrodites [= I. Pan 68] and Didymoi (A.B.-J. and H.C.). - 3. From the hydreumata to the praesidia (A.B.-J. and H.C.). - 4. L. Iulius Ursus, prefect of Egypt (R.S.B.).
